entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Southend Reindeer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Southend 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -33.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -36.7°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
